text: @WhiteHouse Please explain why President doesn’t  know the Dr leading his Coronavirus vaccine team? Doesn’t know that the lead doctor on the vaccine team stepped down? Dr. Bright lead the vaccine team. @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @IvankaTrump
